Camera.Flash:: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama
Camera.Second camera:: 64 MP, f/2.5, (telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom

Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

Battery.Charging::
90W wired, 90W PPS, 40W UFCS
80W wireless
Reverse wireless
5W reverse wired

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades, MagicOS 10
Hardware.Processor:: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)

Multimedia.Speakers:: Yes, with large amplitude stereo speakers

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Connectivity & Features.Location:: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L1+L5), GLONASS
Connectivity & Features.Bluetooth:: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5, Auracast, ASHA
